name: Shelltre
description:
SHELLTRE

Shelltre was made in 2 days using Python, tools:

tools:  Gimp 

Game API:  Pygame

Scripting Language: Python

this game  was made for the Brackeys game jam 2021.2 

P.S: this game is really hard follow me on twitter please comment about the bug reports if any 

if anyone reaches Score: 15 then comment on twitter saying #Shelltre level 15 :)

THANKS FOR PLAYING !! :)

Install instructions:

extract the zip file and click on the run.bat or the run file.

it will take 2 or 3 seconds to run 

enjoy !!!
